title: Devil

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, you may kill one player you've whispered to on any previous day. If you kill your target, your name is revealed to other visitors of your victim unless you are Hunting.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When an evil or neutral player is hanged, you begin to Hunt. While Hunting, your visits are astral, you can choose to send anonymous whispers, and you appear Suspicious.
- When a good player is hanged, you are taken out of Hunting form and return to being a normal human.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
